Posts.Content: Hi Jamie, OMG it sounds like you had quite a day yesterday.  I guess nothing is quick and easy.  I hope you are feeling better today and thankfully breathing easier. Hugs, Ginny
Posts.Title: Wow.........I can breathe again!

Posts.Content: Happy Birthday!!  I hope you had a wonderful day and a happy, healthy year to come. Ginny
Posts.Title: Today is VickiSam's Birthday!!

Posts.Content: Happy Birthday to you New Flower!! Ginny
Posts.Title: NewFlower's Birthday

Posts.Content: You will be in my thoughts and prayers CC!!   Hugs, Ginny
Posts.Title: Pink Bus Please

Posts.Content: I tried to be so strong when I was diagnosed. I kept a lot to myself until I realized I was in a serious depression. Speaking to a counselor and going on lexapro for a year saved my sanity. Of course it's ok to cry, just make sure you are not getting over come with depression. I couldn't believe how fast it happened. The best thing the counselor said to me was ,"You did not have a tooth pulled. You were told you had a disease that was going to change your life forever. It's normal to feel sad."
Posts.Title: When does the crying stop

Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear this sad news.  I am sad for our Pink Sister and for all the Pink Sisters and Brothers she has touched.  I did not know Chen, but I find myself crying as I write this post. So, so sad. Hugs to all, Ginny
Posts.Title: Chenheart -- Any word, or updates?

Posts.Content: Hi Doris, I am so sorry the Taxol has failed, but like you said, "what's next".  I hope the doctor comes up with another alternative that works as well as the Taxol did.  Please let us know what he says next week.  You will be in my thoughts and prayers Doris. Hugs, Ginny
Posts.Title: Taxol Failed ...

Posts.Content: Count me in too!! And going to the oncologist is scarey, so never feel bad about feeling scared.  That's why we are all here. I got the bagels from Panera again! See you Monday, Ginny
Posts.Title: My Pink Sisters, Can I get the pink bus for Monday Morning?

Posts.Content: Hi Tasha, I totally agree with everything Suzanne said.  I tried to be strong, but my anxiety always took over.  I don't think I could have survived without medication.  Everyone is different, but you are going through hell right now, so if you need help to relieve anxiety maybe you can look into medications.  I hope you find some relief Tasha.  Hugs, Ginny
Posts.Title: Well this is just great! NOT :(

Posts.Content: High risk, low risk, no one ever knows for sure. I have wasted more time worrying about things that I have no control over. Just get through the chemo and then take one day at a time.  You are in my thoughts and prayers.   Many, many hugs to you, Ginny
Posts.Title: came back high risk

Posts.Content: Hi Penny, I am so happy for you!!! First a clean bone scan and now feeling better.  I hope you can now get back to doing things you enjoy.  Great, great news!! Ginny
Posts.Title: Aromasin troubles--bone scan pending--need pink bus

Posts.Content: I could not have said it any better Vicki Sam.  Truly remarkable women!!
Posts.Title: SIROD, how are you doing?

Posts.Content: Fantastic news!  Now just continue healing. So, so happy for you. Hugs, Ginny
Posts.Title: London Calling

Posts.Content: Happy Birthday!  Good health and happiness to you. Ginny
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday - Aisling8's -- Victoria

Posts.Content: Hi Doris, I hope you are feeling a little better.  I too am worried about you and hope you are feeling less nauseous today. Hugs, hugs and more hugs, Ginny
Posts.Title: Need what?

Posts.Content: Hi Doris, I am so sorry you are feeling so poorly.  You are such a strong lady, and to hear this from you brings tears to my eyes.  I hope the doctor can give you something to relieve the nausea.  There is nothing worse than that horrible feeling.   You are in my thoughts and prayers. Hugs, Ginny
Posts.Title: Need what?

Posts.Content: I hope you had a great birthday CC!!  May this year bring you health, happiness and the best wedding ever for your daughter.   Hugs, Ginny
Posts.Title: Yesterday was Cypress Cynthia's Birthday!!!!!
